title: General Participant Request Handling
desc:
**This article includes**:

**•** Guidelines on tools and available resources for handling participant's inquiries _*through the phone or tickets*_.
**•** Instructions on how to handle phone calls and tickets, wording, ticket formatting and tool usage for investigation while handling participant's requests.
**•** Procedures regarding how to use our tools for better case resolution and time usage.
**•** Pro Tips that may help to perform as a *FUA* expert ;)

items.title: [1] Onboarding Flowchart
Devrev
items.detail: Our ticketing system for responding to participant inquiries (similar to Zendesk).

items.title: Admin Panel
items.detail: Look up participant and company data to verify accounts and plan details.

items.title: RingCentral
items.detail: Handle inbound and outbound calls with participants.

items.title: RightSignature
items.detail: Send and manage electronic forms and agreements with participants.

items.title: Google Calendar
items.detail: Schedule your weekly tasks, office hours, and follow-up reminders.

items.title: Google Meet
items.detail: Host video calls and screen-shares with participants or internal teams.

items.title: 1Password
items.detail: Securely store and retrieve all platform credentials (recordkeepers, admin panels, etc.).

items.title: Google Drive
items.detail: Central repository for shared files, templates, and reference docs.

items.title: Lucidchart
items.detail: House all project process diagrams and flowcharts for quick reference.

items.title: Mode
items.detail: Query our database for real-time participant and company information.

items.title: Using the Right Tone
items.detail:
Always greet participants warmly, using their name:

"Hi Jane, thanks for reaching out! Happy to help."

Keep explanations clear and concise, avoid jargon, and confirm next steps:

"I’ve updated your address in our system. You’ll receive a confirmation email within 24 hours."

items.title: 401(k)-Specific Wording
items.detail: “To request a distribution, please complete the distribution form in Devrev and attach your account details.” “Early withdrawal before age 59½ may incur penalties – see our distribution policy for details.” “Feel free to reach out if you have any follow-up questions on tax withholding or penalty exceptions.”

items.title: More about Devrev
items.detail:
• Tag every ticket with the appropriate case type (e.g., “Distribution Request”).
• Use standardized macros for common responses.
• Escalate urgent issues via RingCentral immediately.
